headline: AT&T Inc. (T): Strong Buy Stock with a History of Yield and Reinvention
summary: AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is included among the Best Strong Buy Dividend Stocks to Invest in Now. AT&T Inc. (NYSE:T) is a Texas-based multinational telecommunications company. The company has capitalized on a recent Verizon price increase to boost its wireless subscriber base. In the second quarter, the company added 479,000 retail postpaid subscribers, including 401,000 new […]

headline: Verizon Communications (VZ) Expands Partnership With Staples To Enhance Tech Solutions
summary: Verizon Communications (VZ) recently expanded its strategic partnership with Staples, enhancing its retail presence by introducing Verizon kiosks in 35 Staples stores. Despite this development, the company's stock price remained mostly flat over the past week, aligning with broader market trends dominated by strong earnings from major tech companies such as Microsoft and Meta. While the partnership with Staples showcases Verizon's commitment to integrating tech solutions with business...

headline: Staples and Verizon Partnership Expands to 35 Staples Stores This Summer
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass., July 31, 2025--Staples and Verizon expand partnership, bringing internet, phone and tech services to 35 Staples stores for small business and everyday customers.
